Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: 防具屋「極光の結晶」
Entry.EnglishText: Armor Shop

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>
Entry.EnglishText: <Annie>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>
Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda>

Entry.JapaneseText: ノルゼン
Entry.EnglishText: Nolzen

Entry.JapaneseText: ノルゼン・防具屋
Entry.EnglishText: Nolzen - Armor Shop

Entry.JapaneseText: 防具屋
Entry.EnglishText: Armor Shop

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: な、何が起きてるの……!?
Entry.EnglishText: What's going on?!

Entry.JapaneseText: いらっしゃいませ。
Entry.EnglishText: Welcome.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140> 防具を買う 装飾品を買う 世間話をする やめる
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Buy Armor Buy Accessories Talk Cancel
Entry.Notes: was there equipment called decorations? either way, you guys should be able to figure out what it's supposed to be

Entry.JapaneseText: 道中お気をつけて。
Entry.EnglishText: You all take care, now.

Entry.JapaneseText: 武器ばかりそろえたって ダメですよね。 守りもしっかりしないと。
Entry.EnglishText: Weapons aren't the only gear that matters. Defense is just as important as offense.

Entry.JapaneseText: 道中お気をつけて。
Entry.EnglishText: You all take care, now.

Entry.JapaneseText: ちょっと素敵な品々が たくさんありますよ。
Entry.EnglishText: I have a lot of great products in stock.

Entry.JapaneseText: 道中お気をつけて。
Entry.EnglishText: You all take care, now.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Cyan>幻の庭<White>ですか……？ 街のガジュマに聞いてみたら…… いかがですか？
Entry.EnglishText: The <Cyan>Garden of Illusions<White>...? How about you try asking the Gajuma in town about it...?

Entry.JapaneseText: 最近、この街のガジュマたちは ピリピリしています。 街を歩く時は、気をつけてくださいね。
Entry.EnglishText: The Gajuma have been on edge lately. Be careful when out and about.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……身体の丈夫なガジュマの方には、 防具なんて必要ないのかも…… しれませんね……
Entry.EnglishText: Gajuma are pretty robust, so they probably don't need armor... Or maybe they do...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……先日の争いでは、 ガジュマたちが暴れて、 多くのヒューマがケガを……
Entry.EnglishText: There was a fight the other day, and the Gajuma got violent and injured a bunch of Huma...

Entry.JapaneseText: そのあと防具は売れましたが…… 喜ぶに喜べませんね……
Entry.EnglishText: I've been getting a lot of business since then, but it's left a bad taste in my mouth...

Entry.JapaneseText: キュリア先生はガジュマでも 分け隔てなく治療してますけど……
Entry.EnglishText: Dr. Curia doesn't discriminate against Gajuma patients...

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマのお医者さんだったら、 どうだったでしょうね……？
Entry.EnglishText: But would a Gajuma doctor do the same?

Entry.JapaneseText: バイラスに襲われた人たちを キュリア先生が手当てしてる そうですね。
Entry.EnglishText: Dr. Curia's been treating people hurt during the Birus attack.

Entry.JapaneseText: ケガ人はガジュマが多いみたいですし、 逆恨みで先生に危害が及ばなければ いいんですけど……
Entry.EnglishText: A lot of Gajuma were among the injured... I hope they don't reward her kindness with unwarranted violence.

Entry.JapaneseText: あなたみたいな可愛い子が お医者さんだったなんて！
Entry.EnglishText: I'd have never guessed a cute girl like you would have been a doctor!
Entry.Notes: guessing this is talking with Annie

Entry.JapaneseText: やっぱり、ヒューマって 頭のいい種族なんですね……
Entry.EnglishText: Huma really are an intelligent race...

Entry.JapaneseText: あんたも手当を…… ガジュマのくせに……？ どうせ、下心でも……
Entry.EnglishText: You're helping people, even though you're a Gajuma...? Well, even if you do have ulterior motives...

Entry.JapaneseText: あなたたちも、ケガ人の 手当てをしているの？ やっぱり、ヒューマって 優しい種族なんですね……
Entry.EnglishText: Are you helping care for the injured? Huma truly are a compassionate race...
Entry.Notes: and then I guess this is everyone else

Entry.JapaneseText: あれだけの大怪我をしながら、 亡くなったガジュマはいない そうですね……
Entry.EnglishText: I've heard no Gajuma succumbed to their injuries despite having been severely wounded...

Entry.JapaneseText: やっぱり、ガジュマって 身体だけは丈夫なんですね……
Entry.EnglishText: Guess it makes sense, considering how physically hardy they are...

Entry.JapaneseText: 街の人たちも少しだけ落ち着いた みたいだけど、まだ心配だからって、 防具を買いに来るヒューマも 少なくないんですよ……
Entry.EnglishText: The people here have calmed down somewhat, but things are still uneasy. I get plenty of Huma stopping by to buy armor.

Entry.JapaneseText: 捕まったスカラベさんは、 うちのお得意さんだったんです。
Entry.EnglishText: The one who was arrested for the Queen's assassination, Scarabe, was a frequent customer here.

Entry.JapaneseText: 女王様も無事だったんですから、 早く釈放していただきたいです……
Entry.EnglishText: The Queen was unharmed, so I hope he's released soon...

Entry.JapaneseText: ベルサスでの事件の噂が 広まってから、またガジュマたちが イラだっているみたいなんです……
Entry.EnglishText: Ever since they've gotten word about what happened in Belsas, the Gajuma have grown discontent once more...

Entry.JapaneseText: 気をつけてくださいね。
Entry.EnglishText: Watch yourselves out there.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ジルバっていう国のお役人が、 ガジュマびいきをするって 言ってるそうですね……
Entry.EnglishText: Some official named Zilva said this nation was a nation for Gajuma...

Entry.JapaneseText: うちのお店は、ヒューマびいきに しましょうかしら……
Entry.EnglishText: I wonder if I should advertise my shop as being for Huma...

Entry.JapaneseText: ベルサスでの事件の噂が 広まってから、またガジュマたちが イラだっているみたいなんです……
Entry.EnglishText: Ever since they've gotten word about what happened in Belsas, the Gajuma have grown discontent once more...

Entry.JapaneseText: 気をつけてくださいね。
Entry.EnglishText: Watch yourselves out there.

Entry.JapaneseText: うちのお店の商品は、 ヒューマ向けに仕入れてるの。
Entry.EnglishText: The products stocked here are intended for Huma.

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマ用のものは売れ残りの品よ。 それでもよければどうぞ……
Entry.EnglishText: Any Gajuma gear we have are leftover stock. Feel free to buy them if you're okay with that...

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマだけの街って どこかにないかしら…… きっと住みやすいでしょうね……
Entry.EnglishText: Think there are any towns where only Huma live? It'd probably be nicer living in a place like that...

Entry.JapaneseText: 漆黒のギンナルさん…… どうにもオマヌケだけど、 がんばってるわよね……
Entry.EnglishText: Ginnar of the Dark Wings may not be that bright, but he's working his ass off...

Entry.JapaneseText: この前、叱られたの。 誰もがみな<Yellow>ヒト<White>だって。 生きてる仲間だって……
Entry.EnglishText: He told everyone off not too long ago, saying that we're all <Yellow>Man<White>, we're all living comrades...
Entry.Notes: not clear if this is connected to the previous or if he was just scolded in general for being a racist

Entry.JapaneseText: 私、反省して……お店の名前も 「漆黒の結晶」に変えようと 思ってるんです……
Entry.EnglishText: It really got me rethinking things... I'm considering renaming the shop to "Dark Crystal"...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……色々と面倒な世の中に なって来ましたね……
Entry.EnglishText: ...It's hard to navigate society these days...

Entry.JapaneseText: うむ……うむ。
Entry.EnglishText: Hmm, hmm...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……背、伸びたかな？ 伸びてなさそうだネ……
Entry.EnglishText: ...Have I gotten any taller? Doesn't seem like it...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……早く大人になりたいな。
Entry.EnglishText: ...I can't wait to be all grown up.

Entry.JapaneseText: いい具合にボサボサに なってきたな……よしよし！
Entry.EnglishText: Lookin' good, if a little shabby... Yep, yep!

Entry.JapaneseText: 悪くないわね……
Entry.EnglishText: Not looking too bad...

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0>『バロン・オウルの鎧（非売品）』 ノルゼンの伝説のガジュマの戦士、 バロン・オウルの使った鎧。 その巨大な斧は、大地をもまっぷたつに 裂くほどの破壊力があったという。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0>- Baron Owl's Armor (Not for Sale) - Armor used by Nolzen's legendary Gajuma warrior, Baron Owl. His great axe was said to be capable of rending the earth in two.
Entry.Notes: is this person ever mentioned anywhere else? are they even an owl?

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0>『各種ブーツ（商品見本）』 戦士用の一般的なブーツだが、 ノルゼン仕様になっており、 中敷きに毛皮が使われている。 ふわふわとやわらかな足触り。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0>- Assorted Boots (Display) - Standard combat boots are lined up, with Nolzen's signature fur lining on the inside. Fluffy and soft to the touch.
Entry.Notes: I think the weapon store had something similar? with the knives. maybe keep those consistent(or keep consistent with whatever other stores have had since I doubt these were the first)

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0>『レンブラーヌの鎧（非売品）』 ノルゼンを襲った女海賊にひと目ぼれし、 街を裏切って海賊の手先となった ヒューマの男・レンブラーヌの鎧。 ノルゼンには裏切り者が多い。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0>- Rembrandt's Armor (Not for Sale) - Armor worn by Rembrandt, a man who betrayed Nolzen upon falling in love with the pirate queen who laid siege to it. Nolzen is rife with tales of betrayal.
Entry.Notes: again, no idea what kind of name you'd want to use here

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0>『バルーゴの鎧（非売品）』 ノルゼンの娘と恋に落ち、 海賊を裏切って街を守ったという ガジュマの男・バルーゴの鎧。 巨大な角を持っていたので、 仮面は使わなかったという。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0>- Valugo's Armor (Not for Sale) - Armor worn by Valugo, a Gajuma pirate who betrayed his fellow pirates upon falling in love with a woman from Nolzen. His large horns prevented him from wearing a mask.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0>『戦士のグローブ（非売品）』 ・サンダーアームズ 怒りの稲妻がパンチ力となる。 ・モグラアームズ 地面を掘るのに大活躍！ ・ラッキーパンチ 年始めから縁起がいい。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0>- Combat Gloves (NOT FOR SALE) - ・ Thunder Arms Channels the lighting of anger into your punches. ・ Mole Arms Great for digging! ・ Lucky Punch Good luck year-round!
